subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Jérémy Clément's second-half soccer goal gave Paris Saint-Germain a 1-0 victory over Auxerre, ending the French league leader's seven-match winning streak.
snippet: Jérémy Clément's second-half soccer goal gave Paris Saint-Germain a 1-0 victory over Auxerre, ending the French league leader's seven-match winning streak.
